scripts.publish: zip -r function.zip node_modules package.json && cd dist && zip ../function.zip ./**/*.js && cd .. && aws s3 cp function.zip s3://highlight-lambda-code/session-insights-email.zip && rm function.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name session-insights-email --s3-bucket highlight-lambda-code --s3-key session-insights-email.zip
